---
title: Mixed Question Types Quiz
description: A quiz with multiple choice and true/false questions
points_per_question: 1
---

## Question 1
[Type: multiple_choice]
[Points: 1]

What is the capital of Japan?

a) Beijing
b) Seoul
*c) Tokyo
d) Bangkok

## Question 2
[Type: true_false]
[Points: 1]

The Earth is flat.

*a) False
b) True

Feedback: The Earth is an oblate spheroid.

## Question 3
[Type: multiple_choice]
[Points: 2]

Which of these is a programming language?

a) Python
b) Java
c) JavaScript
*d) All of the above

Feedback: All three are widely-used programming languages.
